tswitem.name: Vexing Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Vexing Augment Resonator
An unattuned survivability augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will increase the amount of hate generated by this ability by 20%/ 40%/ 60%/ 80%/ 100%.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 2 Attuned Robust Augment Resonators
  • 60 Pure water
